name: weComm
overview: weComm Limited provides interactive mobile data solutions. Its wave platform enables solutions for interactive mobile TV, media portals, betting and gaming, financial services, and mobile advertising. The company’s solutions include live TV, video on demand, and video clip downloads; subscription, pay-per-view, advertising-funded, and transaction-based; quality of service management for performance, reliability, and integrity; a graphical studio for the creation of a single design and native support of devices; on-demand application delivery for service deployment of new services, updates, and changes; media, messaging, and application support services; and 3VOOR12 Luisterpaal mobile application, which allows users to legally listen to various new or unreleased alternative albums via mobile. It also provides channel switching, in-video now and next channel information and interactivity, electronic program guide with remote PVR record and synopsis information, interactive banner and video advertising with audited click-through actions, live market data streaming, real-time transaction functionality, alerts on market news or prices, live aggregated news headlines and stories, research distribution, access to user and contextual data for targeting, ad delivery, interactivity, tracking, auditing, and reporting solutions, as well as on-demand charts, including moving average analysis, annotation capability, and historical analysis.

acquisition.source_description: OpenText buys London-based mobile app deployment software maker weComm
